name: Pico Bus (Jonny Hunter)
description:
The wait is over! Desert Bus has finally come to the Pico-8 for the whole family to enjoy! This was my first Pico-8 project.  It is complete for the most part, the only thing missing is audio and music which I may add in the future. You can also download the Windows executable below, Enjoy!

Controls

X - Continue

Up/Down - Accelerate/Brake

Left/Right - Steer Left/Right
